quote_last: Good safety system, Vance thought. He could feel them now, beneath the explosiveâ€”electronic sensors on the tracks, a thin line of parallel wires held by insulators, had detected his tampering and halted the gantry.
title: Project Cyclops
author: Thomas Hoover

quote_first: I leaped out of bed, ran down the stairs and into the kitchen through that harsh, searing light. The clock on the wall was showing
quote_last: . I grabbed my black raincoat from the hook by the back door, pulled on my wellington boots, one of which was almost impossible to get my foot into, and rushed outside.
title: After the Fire
author: Henning Mankell
